name: ProPRcopy Copywriters
tag_list: copy-writer, press-release, website-content, copywriter, writer, translation
overview:
ProPRcopy provides fast, affordable and professionally written press releases, articles and website content. Guaranteed.

The proPRcopy team is made up of dedicated communications professionals who are committed to providing the highest-quality written content as quickly, cost-effectively and confidentially as possible.

ProPRcopy writers are experienced professionals in the fields of public relations, marketing and journalism who have extensive knowledge of a wide range of topics and industries. Everything the company produces is edited and proofread by qualified editors, who ensure that our copy is ready to publish and meets the highest standards.

In addition to English, the company provides content in Spanish, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, French, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, German, Korean, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Lao, Thai, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Turkish, Polish, Romanian, Serbian, Bulgarian and 27 other languages.

milestones.description: ProPRCopy, a company that provides fast, affordable and professionally written press releases, articles and website content, announced today that it will offer copywriting services in 52 different languages.
milestones.source_description: ProPRCopy to Offer Copywriting Services in 52 Languages 9

milestones.description: ProPRcopy, the Wisconsin-based copywriting firm, today announced the launch of its white-labeled services, now available to SEO firms, advertising agencies and public relations and marketing firms.
